meanings.sent1: I will retell the story to my friend tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She likes to retell her favorite stories to her siblings.
meanings.sent3: Let's retell the tale with a funny twist!
meanings.sent4: He retells the story as if it happened to him.
meanings.sent5: The children retell the story with great enthusiasm.

meanings.sent1: Can you retell what happened at the party last night?
meanings.sent2: They retell the events of the day to their parents every evening.
meanings.sent3: I retell the story in a dramatic way to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent4: She retells the experience like a seasoned storyteller.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to retell the story in their own words.
